addHistoire(String, String, boolean, boolean, String, String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
add the story to the data base and returns the id of the paragraph that must be modified the first paragraph is created with a default text since the information about it's id must be stored in the stories table
addHistoryToDB(Historique) - Method in class dao.HistoriqueDAO
Can be used to add a new history or modify an old one
addInvited(String, String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
indicates that a given user is invited to participate in a story this method does not do any verifications about the fact if the story is public in writing mode or not

addParagraphe(String, String, boolean, String, boolean) - Method in class dao.ParagrapheDAO

associateNextParagraph(String, int, String, int) - Method in class dao.ParagrapheDAO
this method allows to define a paragraph as a next for a given paragraph, it stores in fact the next paragraph in the paragraph as a choice with a default text 'Paragraphe suivante'
associateParagraph(int, int, String) - Method in class dao.ChoixDAO
